name: UploadX
body:
### Welcome to the UploadX Page
## What is UploadX?
UploadX is a student project aiming to bring the functionality of the [ShareX](https://getsharex.com/) platform to Linux through Python.

## Why?
We enjoy the ease at which ShareX and [services like it](http://puush.me/) allow users to upload and distribute images from their computers. We found a lack of such service on Linux distributions and decided to create our own service using Python as a multi-platform distribution method.

## Documents
[Design Review Prep Document](http://daniel6.github.io/softdes2015finalproject/DesignReviewPreparation.pdf)
